name: ramamo.com
tag_list: advertisements, marketing-platform, revenue-sharing, mobile, social-media, marketing-platform-as-a-service, mpaas
overview:
Implementing MPaaS (Marketing-Platform-as-a-Service), ramamo.com is an innovative just-in-time web-based marketing & advertisement platform offering a meeting point for users, social networks, and advertisers. ramamo.com provides easy-to-use services to marketers and local businesses around the globe to reach different market segments using a sophisticated proximity-based Geo-data. At the same time, it allows the registered users to receive the marketing messages on various media and get rewarded for reviewing them.

By providing geo-aware and profile-based advertisement (ramamoAD) along with pay-per-audience billing, ramamo.com helps advertisers and local businesses save the marketing costs related to generic on-the-air or published-based advertising. Mobile users registering with ramamo.com receive SMS ads on their mobile phone and in return they get significant cash rewards for reading the advertisement they receive, wherever in the world they are or whatever mobile phone they use. In addition, they can broadcast ramamoADs across their social networks and get paid for sharing with their connections. Finally, ramamo registered users are also cash-rewarded every time one of their referrals send or receive ramamoAD.

Advertisers leverage the ramamo.com platform by utilizing a new creative online medium that offers a cost-effective, simple and yet powerful tool for targeting large mobile markets and social networks directly.
